analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x698d32b991eeff6f08d0af10e65c0219fd2f225e.sol:

	 - buy (/unique_chucks/6/0x698d32b991eeff6f08d0af10e65c0219fd2f225e.sol#165-169)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
